LANDING.TITLE: The Sustainability Assessment is a digital tool that helps you discover valuable information about the current level of sustainability of their projects and entities. Nowadays, more organisations are seeking to understand the current sustainability practices, which is crucial to amplifying their impact and driving positive change.

USER.TITLE: Please fill the organisation information to continue
USER.INDUSTRYCHECK: If your company operates in multiple industries, please select the options that represent the largest operating activity of the company.
USER.LABELCHECK: By sending this form, you agree to us getting in contact with you via the email address provided. This form will take approximately 60 minutes to fill out, you'll be able to leave at any moment and resume it. All information will be automatically saved in your browser's cookies.

LOGIN.REFRESH: Refresh the screen to see the changes

RESULT.LABEL1: Having completed the Pre-assessment Checklist, you've primed your project or organizational planning with CPSI considerations. This step illuminates your current sustainability standing and identifies areas for growth, enhancing your project's objectives and overall sustainability efforts
RESULT.LABEL3: By navigating through six category tabs and assessing 67 credits, you've evaluated your project's alignment with sustainable practices. Each credit's intent, metric, and assessment questions provided guidance, forming a detailed sustainability profile. Remember, unanswered questions default to 'no', stressing the importance of thorough engagement.
RESULT.LABEL4: Regarding your score, remember it's a starting point, offering an estimate rather than a final verdict. Use the insights gained to guide your next steps, whether that's deepening current commitments or broadening your approach.
RESULT.LABEL5: For further guidance and to enhance your sustainability journey, join our community at joinus@green-cross.org.uk. Your proactive steps today pave the way for a more sustainable tomorrow.
RESULT.LABEL6: A group of specialists will be analyzing your report and contacting you shortly. You've successfully completed the Pre-assessment Checklist, evaluating your project's sustainability across six categories and 67 credits, which outlines your current sustainability status and potential areas for improvement. Remember, the score you've received is just a starting point. For further assistance, feel free to join our community at joinus@green-cross.org.uk.

SECTION.VERIFIED: Mark as verified by G+ UK
